Bases: PyQt4.QtGui.QGraphicsItem

A GraphicsItem that is not actually drawn itself, but is the parent of the peak symbol and peak annotation.

TODO: Add hover effect for 1D peaks.

class ccpn.ui.gui.modules.spectrumItems.GuiPeakListView.Peak1dAnnotation(peakItem, scene)[source]¶

Bases: PyQt4.QtGui.QGraphicsSimpleTextItem

A text annotation of a peak. The text rotation is currently always +-45 degrees (depending on peak height).

class ccpn.ui.gui.modules.spectrumItems.GuiPeakListView.Peak1dSymbol(scene, parent)[source]¶

Bases: PyQt4.QtGui.QGraphicsItem

A graphical symbol representing the peak. Currently only a dashed line from the peak to the peak annotation is used. This can be improved. The length of the line is related to the height of the peak.

hz = None¶

self.rectItem = QtGui.QGraphicsRectItem(-hz, -hz, sz, sz, self.peakLayer, scene) color = QtGui.QColor(‘cyan’) self.rectItem.setBrush(QtGui.QBrush(color))
